post.text: Good morning America! This is a MOVEMENT- and WE are going to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN- starting in January 2017!

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: Good speech Paul Ryan - but a little more about Trump would have been better. I understand as the head of the Republian convention you are supposed to be the "uniter". but speaking more positive and more often about the nominee would have only added to your speech.

replies.author: Tessa
replies.text: Yeah, trump has divided America Beyond recognition. His own party tried to stop him at the last second.
